Description.Text: Kaani Beach Hotel at Maafushi is a popular choice amongst travelers in Maldives Islands, whether exploring or just passing through. Offering a variety of facilities and services, the hotel provides all you need for a good night's sleep. To be found at the hotel are free Wi-Fi in all rooms, 24-hour front desk, 24-hour room service, express check-in/check-out, luggage storage. Guestrooms are designed to provide an optimal level of comfort with welcoming decor and some offering convenient amenities like television LCD/plasma screen, internet access – wireless, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms, air conditioning. Enjoy the hotel's recreational facilities, including massage, water sports (motorized), water sports (non-motorized), games room, before retiring to your room for a well-deserved rest. A welcoming atmosphere and excellent service are what you can expect during your stay at Kaani Beach Hotel at Maafushi.
Kaani Beach Hotel at Maafushi is a popular choice amongst travelers in Maldives Islands, whether exp

RoomType.text: Deluxe Room with Balcony - City View

Message.Text:
Room No: 1

Included in booking cost -
Green Tax USD 24.00
The property is located in the local island of Maafushi where the Government regulations require that guests not to wear bikini or similar swimwear.
However, the property can arrange excursions to picnic islands for guests where these restrictions are not applied.

Transfer to Maafushi Hotels
To reach the hotels in Maafushi Island, a Public ferry, Speedboat ferry OR Private speedboat can be arranged by the hotel for which payment will be collected upon check–in.
Please contact the property to book transfer arrangement at least 3 days prior to arrival. Arrival and departure flight details and full names of traveling party will be required.

Transfer Type: Public Ferry (1 hour 30 minutes)
Cost USD 2.00 per person per way
Departure from Male’ City (Villingili Ferry Terminal) at 3:00 PM every day except Friday
Departure from Male’ City (Villingili Ferry Terminal) at 10:00 am on Tuesday, Thursday and Sunday

Transfer Type: Private Speedboat (30 minutes)
Cost USD 150.00 per way (maximum capacity of 10 guests)
Advance booking is required for speedboat transfer.

Transfer Type: Speedboat Ferry (35 minutes)
Cost USD 20 per person per way
Counter No. 20 at Airport
Departure from Male’ City/ Airport to Maafushi Island available every day at 10:45 AM, 4:00 PM and 10:15 PM
Departure from Hotel to Male’ City/ Airport available every day at 8:00 AM, 12:30 PM and 6:30 PM

Transfer rates are subject to change without prior notice.

No amendments or name changes can be made to this booking once it is confirmed.
